attributes.additional_details: People feel so much better, after a good deed, you could~ invite elderly neighbour for tea, buy a homeless person a hot meal, take a disabled person out shopping, check on your neighbours, help a lady with a pram, cross the road, buy struggling family some shopping, give to a charity and more.
attributes.background: Do a good deed , for someone in need

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a petition calling on the Government to create a good deed day and encourage people to take part.
